review: Got this for my (older) parents for christmas and it works great so far.  It isn't so overly technical that they can't understand it and all the apps work as advertised with minimal set up required.Pros:- small size, so fits unobtrusively on the side of the tv (usually)- plethora of apps- fast, crisp video playback with little lag- easy to set up and useCons:- will not work without packaged AC adapter- AC adapter plug is in a weird place that causes the cord to stick out from the side of the tv (not a huge problem but can be unsightly)- remote can be a bit awkward at times (the universal circle input can be hard to use)- battery cover on the remote is all but impossible to get off amking changing batteries a chore
author: Amazon Customer
